sections.title: Introduction to DC Motors
sections.content: DC motors are the primary actuators for FTC robots, providing the force needed for movement and mechanism operation.

sections.title: Key DC Motor Facts
sections.subtitle: What you need to know
items: DC motors convert electrical energy into rotational motion
FTC legal motors include Neverest, REV HD Hex, and others
Motors are controlled by setting power from -1.0 to 1.0
Direction and speed are programmable in code
Encoders can be attached for precise control

sections.title: Basic Motor Control Example
Configuration
sections.content: Always check motor wiring and configuration in the Robot Controller app. Incorrect setup can lead to unexpected behavior.
